articles.title: Silent growths within: When large internal masses go unnoticed in women
articles.description: In Kenya, many women live with silent internal growths — fibroids, ovarian cysts and other masses — without realising the potential impact on their health and fertility.
articles.content:
Slow-growing abnormalities often go unnoticed for years, masked as mild discomfort, heavy periods or digestive problems. [Courtesy]
